data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Getafe.
In the minute 7, Cesar Soto Grado signals a Getafe throw-in in Barcelona's half.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
Getafe to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
In the minute 8, Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 10, Can Getafe capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Getafe.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Getafe.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the away team in Getafe.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Barcelona.
Getafe have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Cesar Soto Grado awards Barcelona a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Getafe's Nemanja Maksimovic is on target but unsuccessful.
So close for Barcelona as Lionel Messi's shot comes back off the post.
Getafe have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, In Getafe Getafe drive forward through Marc Cucurella. His shot is on target but it's saved.
At Coliseum Alfonso Pérez, Gerard Pique has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 24, Getafe's Cucho Hernandez is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick Getafe.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Cucho Hernandez for Getafe who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a throw-in for Getafe, close to Barcelona's area.
In the minute 26, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jaime Mata (Getafe) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 28, In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Erick Cabaco for Getafe has been booked by Cesar Soto Grado and receives a first yellow card.
Barcelona pushes forward through Clement Lenglet, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 30, Barcelona are coming forward and Antoine Griezmann gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Jaime Mata of Getafe gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 31, Barcelona have a goal kick.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Getafe.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Barcelona.
In the minute 35, In Getafe, Barcelona push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Barcelona.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, Free kick in a good position for Barcelona!
Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) has received a yellow card from Cesar Soto Grado.
Barcelona drives forward and Lionel Messi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Getafe close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Getafe.
In the minute 45, Cesar Soto Grado awards Barcelona a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Getafe.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Barcelona have a goal kick.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Getafe.
Throw-in Getafe.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 52, Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Getafe.
An attacking Getafe player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Jaime Mata nets and Getafe now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 58, Barcelona to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
In the minute 62, The away team replace Ousmane Dembele with Ansu Fati.
Ronald Koeman is making the team's second substitution at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez with Philippe Coutinho replacing Pedri.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Barcelona just outside Getafe's area.
In the minute 64, Gerard Pique's header is off-target for Barcelona.
Goal kick for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the home team in Getafe.
Can Barcelona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Getafe's half?
Getafe needs to be cautious. Barcelona have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 69, Barcelona's Ansu Fati breaks free at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Cesar Soto Grado awards Getafe a goal kick.
Jaime Mata is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 71, Enes Ünal (Getafe) has replaced the possibly injured Jaime Mata at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Free kick Getafe.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
In the minute 73, In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Allan Nyom is booked for the home team.
In the minute 74, Throw-in high up the field for Barcelona in Getafe.
Getafe drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 77, Getafe have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Marc Cucurella of Getafe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Barcelona are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 80, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Trincao is replacing Antoine Griezmann for the away team.
Barcelona make their fourth substitution with Martin Braithwaite replacing Frenkie De Jong.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Getafe.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 84, Getafe have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
At Coliseum Alfonso Pérez, Barcelona are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in Getafe.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 87, Ronald Koeman (Barcelona) is making a fifth substitution, with Riqui Puig replacing Sergi Roberto.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Barcelona.
In the minute 89, Cucho Hernandez for Getafe gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Getafe throw-in in Barcelona's half.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Getafe.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi misses with an attempt on goal.
Getafe have a goal kick.
Barcelona push forward at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez and Philippe Coutinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Getafe defence.
Getafe are in shooting range from this free kick.
Getafe are pushing forward but Victor Mollejo's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
David Timor is on a sub for Cucho Hernandez for Getafe.
Mathias Olivera (Getafe) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Getafe make their third substitution with Victor Mollejo replacing Nemanja Maksimovic.
Sergino Dest (Barcelona) gets a yellow card.
